co.templex.banbot.http

Class HTTPServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.iki.elonen.NanoHTTPD
      • co.templex.banbot.http.HTTPServer

  • public class HTTPServer
extends fi.iki.elonen.NanoHTTPD
    HTTP Server implementation for hosting JUST the banlist. This server will return nothing but the banlist or, in the case where the banlist is not readable, error code 500 and an appropriate message.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • HTTPServer

        public HTTPServer(@NonNull
                  java.util.Properties properties,
                  @NonNull
                  java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch shutdownLatch)
        Main constructor for the HTTP Server class. Accepts a properties instance and a countdown latch instance. Note that the properties instance passed may have no entries; the defaults for the HTTP Server is hosting at 0.0.0.0:8080, which is target functionality for most uses.

        Users may optionally specify a host with the "host" property and specify a port with the "port" property within the properties file. The properties file may optionally not exist, but should be named "http.properties" if custom specification is required.

        Parameters:
        properties - The properties associated with this HTTP Server instance. This may be empty.
        shutdownLatch - The shutdown latch associated with this HTTP Server instance.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Establishes and runs the HTTP Server. The server will begin to listen for connections as specified in the constructor.
        Overrides:
        start in class fi.iki.elonen.NanoHTTPD
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Iff the port is already used on the specified host.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Shutdown method for the HTTP server. This is only overridden to ensure that the countdown latch is triggered.
        Overrides:
        stop in class fi.iki.elonen.NanoHTTPD

      • serve

        public fi.iki.elonen.NanoHTTPD.Response serve(fi.iki.elonen.NanoHTTPD.IHTTPSession session)
        Serve method for this HTTP server, which either serves the banlist or an error code 500 with an appropriate message. This implements NanoHTTPD#serve.
        Overrides:
        serve in class fi.iki.elonen.NanoHTTPD
        Parameters:
        session - The HTTP session. This is unused by this implementation.
        Returns:
        response The response sent to the client.
